domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

text:
@CNN People have the ability and a right to choose.

They can attend or they can stay at home.

Those that take the risk of getting covid-19 can attend.

Those that will not take that risk can refuse to attend.

It is called"FREEDOM OF CHOICE"

#Trump2020Landslide
